message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even considering its value to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I can go that high. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8,000
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is already a significant discount on my end.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $8,000. How about we meet at $10,000?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $12,000 is my final offer - I need to factor in the value this product holds for me.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm really looking for a good deal. How about we meet at $9,500?
